title: Real Madrid sack Julen Lopetegui as manager - BBC Sport
snippet: Real, Champions League winners for the past three years, are ninth in La Liga after their worst start since 2001-02. The 52-year-old will be "provisionally replaced" by ex-player Santiago Solari, coach of B team Castilla.

title: Julen Lopetegui - Wikipedia
snippet: On 12 June 2018, with the team already in Russia for the tournament, it was announced that Lopetegui would take over as the head coach of Real Madrid on a three-year contract after the conclusion of Spain's involvement at the World Cup.

title: Real Madrid, a luxury temporary worker to replace Ancelotti
snippet: According to the media, in recent days and weeks, Xabi Alonso will successfully succeeded Carlo Ancelotti as Real Madrid's main coach, but only after the FIFA club World Cup, which will start in June and will be held in the United States this summer.
